General.Name: Ege Gubre Sanayi AS
General.Description: Ege Gübre Sanayii A.S. produces and sells fertilizers in Turkey. The company offers compound, composite, and diamonyum phosphate fertilizers. It also provides various port services, including cargo handling, storage, container repair/cleaning, field stacking and offdock outdoor services, as well as tank terminals services. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Izmir, Turkey
